szczerbatek.title: Szczerbatek
szczerbatek.description: Our flagship plane is named 'Szczerbatek' (pronounced 'Sh-cher-ba-tek', meaning 'Toothless' in Polish - yes, we know it's a tongue twister!). A versatile aircraft designed for autonomous flight, data collection, and maybe even making dentists nervous.

organization.description: Student organization dedicated to building innovative solar-powered aircraft.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.

hero.title: AGH Solar Plane
hero.subtitle: Join us in revolutionizing sustainable aviation - where student innovation meets the power of the sun

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a passionate team of students from AGH University of Science and Technology, dedicated to pushing the boundaries of solar aviation. Our mission is to design, build, and fly innovative solar-powered aircraft while developing sustainable solutions for the future of aviation.

sections.title: Our Sections
sections.description: We operate across multiple specialized teams, each contributing to our mission

electronics.title: Electronics and Power
electronics.description: Developing electronics systems, power solutions for efficient flight and gathering telemetry data.

construction.title: Construction
construction.description: Creating innovative structural solutions using lightweight materials and advanced manufacturing techniques.

programming.title: Programming
programming.description: Building cutting-edge applications for flight control, data analysis, and vision systems.

marketing.title: Marketing and Documentation
marketing.description: Promoting our projects, managing social media, and taking care of boring paperwork.

solar.title: Solar Power Systems
solar.description: Designing and integrating solar power systems to maximize energy efficiency and performance.

join.title: Join Our Team
join.description: Ready to make an impact in sustainable aviation? We're always looking for passionate students to join our team.

recruitment.title: Watch for Recruitment
recruitment.description: Follow us on social media to stay updated about our recruitment periods and events.

direct.title: Contact Us Directly
direct.description: Have questions or can't wait? Drop us an email

sponsor.title: Become a Sponsor
sponsor.description: Support the future of sustainable aviation. By sponsoring our project, you'll help develop innovative solar-powered aircraft while gaining visibility in the aerospace industry.

cta.title: Partner With Us
cta.description: Interested in supporting our mission? Contact us to discuss partnership opportunities.
